title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API, supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured, self-hosted web interface for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Unofficial Go CLI wrapper for Ollama with extra utilities (model search, prompt templates).

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for QA & RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in open-source replacement for OpenAI Codex using Ollama models.

title: ollama-ts
summary: Community TypeScript client with stricter types and RxJS streams.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama services.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-node
summary: Unofficial Node.js client with ESM support and fetch adapter.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await and streaming chat.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Experimental gRPC proxy in front of Ollama’s REST API for high-throughput services.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Curated list of community-tuned GGUF models ready to pull into Ollama.
